name: Scythe 2
description: This is the sequel to my old megawad "Scythe". Expect better looking and bigger levels. unfortunately, the last 3 levels are missing, because I am so lazy and I haven't been satisfied with my attempts at making map28. I might release the last 3 maps some time in the future, but do not count on it. (Update: the last 3 maps are now completed!)
